The property is located in the Fuente Cisneros neighborhood, just a few minutes from the capital. Very close to the Parque Oeste shopping area and right in front of the X-Madrid Leisure Center. The property is located in a gated community with a 24-hour concierge service. It also has common areas such as a swimming pool, green areas, a community venue for events, a paddle tennis court and a children's playground. Upon crossing the threshold we will find a large hall that leads us on one side to the kitchen and a first laundry terrace. On the other hand we access the living room of more than 20 m² facing south that is filled with light through the windows that give access to the terrace with unobstructed 180º views. Finally, the hall opens onto the corridor that distributes the night area of the house. We will first find a built-in wardrobe and the first bedroom. Just across from this is a full bathroom. At the end of the corridor is the master bedroom with bathroom en suite and opposite, the third bedroom. The house has ducted air conditioning in all rooms. Smooth walls, parquet floors except in the kitchen, bathrooms and terraces, heating and ACS by natural gas and climalit windows. It also has a large garage space and a storage room in the basement of the same building. Located in the Fuente Cisneros neighborhood in Alcorcón. It has educational centers (Andel and Fuenllana), the Alcorcón Campus of the Rey Juan Carlos University, Quirón de Alcorcón Hospital, Cultural Center, Fuente Cisneros and Prado Ovejero Parks), supermarket, pharmacy and various catering establishments. description: INMOBILIARIA CALVO offers for sale and WITHOUT AGENCY COMMISSION this impressive 4-bedroom apartment located in the best area of Parque Lisboa de Alcorcón. One of them with access to the open terrace. In the interior area of the house there are two complete bathrooms, one with a shower and the other with a bathtub, both with a window to an interior patio for better ventilation. The living room is the most pleasant room in the house due to its spaciousness and the large windows that allow light to pass through, revealing a spectacular landscape. From the living room you will have access to the closed terrace where you can enjoy a cozy space with your loved ones. This terrace goes around the corner, communicating with the kitchen also on the outside. The kitchen is a large room that is attached to the separate dining room or living room, which offers many options for reforming the home. The floors are made of wood and stoneware, aluminum exterior carpentry and it has air conditioning in three of the four bedrooms and the living room. The property has two elevators, a doorman, central heating and ramp access to the building. In the area you can find supermarkets, beauty centers, bank offices, pharmacy, veterinarian, daycare centers, schools, institutes, the "Parque Lisboa" Social Sports Club and the "Ramón y Cajal" health center. suggestedTexts: {'subtitle': 'Casco Antiguo, Alcorcón', 'title': 'Flat in Calle Polvoranca , 14'}
description: “An OASIS in the center of Alcorcón” We present you a unique opportunity to acquire a new construction home in the heart of Alcorcón, where luxury and comfort merge in an exceptional way. Welcome to the OASIS Building, an exceptional architectural project conceived by the famous Area3-Arquitectura studio. In this privileged corner of Alcorcón, we offer you 1 and 2 bedroom homes, all of them located in a corner building, which guarantees that each home is bright and exterior, a building equipped with optional parking spaces and storage rooms, price of each space at €18,000 + VAT and storage room prices at €7,000 + VAT, adding a touch of comfort and extra space to your lifestyle. The location of this building is simply unbeatable. You will have a wide range of services and amenities at your disposal in your new home. You will be a short distance from the central Renfe and Parque Lisboa Sur Metro stations, as well as urban and interurban bus stops, the Town Hall, supermarkets, restaurants and everything you may need for your daily life. In addition, you will be just 15 minutes by car from the center of Madrid. In terms of quality and energy efficiency, the OASIS Building is a leader in its class. We have incorporated an advanced aerothermal air conditioning system, which includes underfloor heating to keep your home warm in winter and cooling floor to ensure a cool environment in summer. The windows have exceptional thermal and acoustic insulation, ensuring your peace of mind and comfort at all times. Our homes also include kitchens furnished with an elegant and careful design, designed to satisfy the most demanding tastes. And that's not all, on the roof of the OASIS Building, we have reserved an exclusive space for you. Here, you can enjoy a swimming pool with a solarium and a children's play park, creating your own oasis in the center of the city. Magnificent location, design, comfort and efficiency come together in this unique project. Do not miss this exceptional opportunity, because we are sure that it will not be repeated. The OASIS Building is an investment in quality of life and well-being that you will not want to miss.
